DOC.brief_summary: Photobiomodulation therapy ( PBMT ) non-pharmacological method commonly use treatment musculoskeletal disorder . However , high-quality scientific evidence support effectiveness therapy treatment patient chronic low back pain , short , medium long term . The present research project aim evaluate effect PBMT patient chronic non-specific low back pain .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , triple-blinded , placebo-controlled trial , voluntary patient chronic non-specific low back pain.One hundred forty-eight patient randomly allocate two treatment group : Placebo PBMT 4 week ( 3 time per week , total 12 session 27 minute ) . The clinical outcome obtain completion treatment ( 4 week ) 3 , 6 12 month randomization . The data collect blinded assessor . The statistical analysis follow intention-to-treat principle between-group difference calculate use mixed linear model . The outcomes interest pain intensity , disability , function global perceived effect .
DOC.criteria: patient seek care chronic nonspecific low back pain ( define pain discomfort costal margin inferior gluteal fold , without refer symptom low limb , least 3 month ) ; pain intensity least 3 point measure 010 point pain numerical rating scale ; age 18 65 year ; able read Portuguese . evidence nerve root compromise ( i.e . one motor , reflex sensation deficit ) ; serious spinal pathology ( fracture , tumor , inflammatory infectious disease ) ; serious cardiovascular metabolic disease ; previous back surgery ; pregnancy .
DOC.keyword: low back pain , photobiomodulation therapy , LLLT
